description: DC operating point golden data for BSIM3v3.3 MOSFET circuits
notes: Spicier implements 'BSIM3-lite' with ~30 core parameters. Tolerances are generous (20-30%) due to simplified equations vs full BSIM3.

circuits.name: bsim3_nmos_saturation
circuits.netlist:
BSIM3 NMOS Saturation
.MODEL NMOD NMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=0.4 K1=0.5 U0=670 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.5e5
M1 d g 0 0 NMOD W=1u L=100n
Vds d 0 DC 1.0
Vgs g 0 DC 1.0
.end

circuits.name: bsim3_nmos_linear
circuits.description: BSIM3 NMOS in linear region (Vgs=1V, Vds=0.2V)
circuits.netlist:
BSIM3 NMOS Linear
.MODEL NMOD NMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=0.4 K1=0.5 U0=670 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.5e5
M1 d g 0 0 NMOD W=1u L=100n
Vds d 0 DC 0.2
Vgs g 0 DC 1.0
.end

analysis.notes: ngspice BSIM3v3.3: Ids=132.4µA in linear/triode region

circuits.name: bsim3_nmos_subthreshold
circuits.netlist:
BSIM3 NMOS Subthreshold
.MODEL NMOD NMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=0.4 K1=0.5 U0=670 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.5e5 VOFF=-0.1 NFACTOR=1.0
M1 d g 0 0 NMOD W=1u L=100n
Vds d 0 DC 1.0
Vgs g 0 DC 0.3
.end

analysis.notes: ngspice BSIM3v3.3: Ids=2.33µA in weak inversion. Higher tolerance due to subthreshold model differences.

circuits.name: bsim3_cmos_inverter
circuits.description: BSIM3 CMOS inverter at mid-rail input
circuits.netlist:
BSIM3 CMOS Inverter
.MODEL NMOD NMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=0.4 K1=0.5 U0=670 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.5e5
.MODEL PMOD PMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=-0.4 K1=0.5 U0=250 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.0e5
VDD vdd 0 DC 1.8
VIN in 0 DC 0.9
MP vdd in out vdd PMOD W=2u L=100n
MN out in 0 0 NMOD W=1u L=100n
.end

analysis.notes: ngspice: Vout=0.856V when both transistors conduct equally. Higher tolerance for CMOS due to compound model effects.

circuits.name: bsim3_nmos_resistive_load
circuits.description: BSIM3 NMOS with resistive load, tests current accuracy
circuits.netlist:
BSIM3 NMOS Resistive Load
.MODEL NMOD NMOS LEVEL=49 VTH0=0.4 K1=0.5 U0=670 TOX=9e-9 VSAT=1.5e5
VDD vdd 0 DC 3.3
VGS g 0 DC 1.5
RL vdd d 10k
M1 d g 0 0 NMOD W=1u L=100n
.end

analysis.notes: NMOS with 10k load. V(d) depends on Ids which should be ~280µA giving V(d)=3.3-2.8=0.5V (approx).
